name: routers/MongoResourceRouter.js
MongoResourceRouter
description: makeen-router class which exposes a full-CRUD RESTfull API

params.name: Repository
params.description:
repository service used to perform
all data related operations

params.name: config
params.description:
configuration options which can have the
following fields:
entitySchema - joi schema of the corespoding data entity

name: findById
description: HTTP Hanlder: finds one entity by id

name: replaceOne
description: HTTP Request: performs full entity replace

name: updateOne
description: HTTP Handler: performs partial entity update

params.name: routes
params.description: array of routes for which to apply context

params.name: options.generateContext
params.description:
function that will
 generated the context to be applied

name: routers/Octobus.js
routers/Router.js
